page.title: 16HORBURY PEOPLE'S HOLIDAYS
page.content: Many people from Horbury go to Spain for their annual holidays because it's cheap and they want to get away from typical English weather! The first foreign holiday I went on was to Arenal,on the Spanish island of Majorca.We caught an aircraft operated by the Dan-Air company from Manchester Airport.On the plane we were served with a cooked breakfast of bacon,eggs,baked beans and tomatoes. On Majorca we stayed at the Hotel Salama,which was quite big and had a swimming pool.While we were there we went to a barbeque where there was Spanish Flamenco dancing and traditional guitar music.We ate roasted chicken with tossed salad and had a choice of wine or fresh fruit juice.We hired a car but had to cancel a trip to the north of the island because it's brakes were not good.
